column4: so i've got a command to list dependencies of a package, "apt-cache depends --recurse packagename" , but now i'm not sure how to use this output in a command that will fetch all the dependencies for me
i should be able to type, "please fetch all the dependencies as indicated by apt-cache depends --recurse packagename" ... somehow i don't think that will work
are you sure you don't want build-dep?
i'm trying to get the dependencies for a host that is offline i.e. not bridged to the internet, when i tried to use build-dep on the internet host,
